raw_text_tweet: The movement of cows at the old bus stand in the early morning hours is causing disruption to bus traffic and causing fear to passengers. The corporation administration is requested to take appropriate action. https://t.co/N3Q9DPB7kf

Public have alleged that auto drivers are loading passengers at the Vellore Old Bus Stand where passengers board the bus, making it difficult to board the buses and causing traffic congestion. https://t.co/swvEk2kab4

#Vellore corporation seized as many as five cows roaming on the main roads at Old Bus Stand, near Sarathi Maligai on Anna Salai, and Gandhi Nagar, besides penalising their owners with a Rs 5,000 fine. 
https://t.co/y2hTayBGLQ

Traffic mgmt in key roads of #Vellore is excellent. Eye hospital, Makkan, Old fish market, Filterbed road, Muslim HS - great work by Traffic PS. One of the worst managed road jn in VLR is Chittoor Busstand signal. It deserves a flyover @Nammavellore @Velloretimes @Updates_Vellore
One person has died after a section of an under-construction Metro Rail flyover collapsed near Ramapuram in Chennai. Traffic has been diverted on the Guindy-Poonamallee route. https://t.co/2EltgRuSp3

Vellore, Tamil Nadu: A granite-laden lorry broke down near Pallikonda on the Bangalore-Chennai National Highway after hitting a speed breaker, causing a 5 km traffic jam.
